description: This file contains Data Access Object (DAO) interfaces for interacting with a database in a Kotlin-based Android application, utilizing Room library annotations. It defines data access methods for level progress, achievements, and rewards.

methods.name: getByLevel
methods.description: Retrieves the level progress for a specific level.

methods.name: observeAll
methods.description: Returns a flow observing all entries for levels, achievements, or rewards.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or replaces an entity in the database.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing entity in the database.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.description: Deletes all entries from the respective table.

methods.name: upsertProgress
methods.description: Updates or inserts level progress with new stats, maintaining the best stars, score, and completion status.

methods.name: getByCode
methods.description: Retrieves an achievement entity by its code.
